title: Top 10 causes of infant mortality in Canada in 2018
summary: In 2011 , the highest number of passenger immigrants in the united kingdom was recorded , with a total of 54386 deaths . In comparison , the number of deaths had the highest number of fatal deaths , with 10 percent of the number of deaths who had been increasing at home . This was the second highest number of deaths reported in the country .

data.Cause: Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
Disorders related to short gestation and low birth weight not elsewhere classified
Newborn affected by maternal complications of pregnancy
Newborn affected by complications of placenta cord and membranes

gold: This statistic shows the leading causes of infant mortality in Canada in 2018 . In 2018 , the leading cause of death of infants less than one year of age , at 412 deaths , was congenital malformations , deformations and chromosomal abnormalities .
